name.baseName: 塑料丝、绳及编织品|树脂、助剂|熔化-挤塑-拉丝|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该数据集涉及使用树脂和辅助材料通过熔化、挤出和拉丝工艺制造塑料线、绳和编织产品的工艺，适用于所有规格。此外，它包含了多种末端处理技术来减少挥发性有机化合物（VOCs）的排放。这些技术包括活性炭吸附、低温等离子、再生热燃烧、光催化、光解以及它们的组合。数据集还考虑了VOCs的直接排放，无需处理。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码29,四级代码2923文件，在完整版文件中第3308页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisRegenerative thermal combustion method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management95，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Annual actual operating hours of desulfurization facilities / annual actual operating hours of units
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是蓄热式热力燃烧法，其效率为95，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisLow temperature plasma + activated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management80，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Annual actual operating hours of desulfurization facilities / annual actual operating hours of units
污染物指标挥发性有机物①的末端治理技术是低温等离子体+活性炭吸附，其效率为80，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废气治理设施运行时间（小时/年）/废气产污工段正常生产时间（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为挥发性有机物①，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为挥发性有机物①

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为塑料丝、绳及编织品，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为工业废气量

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution volatile organic compoundisActivated carbon adsorption，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is Annual actual operating hours of desulfurization facilities / annual actual operating hours of units
